description: Make picture-perfect doughnuts at home with this brilliant air-fryer recipe. Fluffy and easy to make, try these sweet gems for a delicious dessert.
name: Easy Air-Fryer Doughnuts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place flour and 1/2 cup sugar in a large bowl. Add yoghurt and stir to combine. If dough is a little dry, add 1 tbs water. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead until smooth. Cut dough into 8 portions.

Roll dough portions into balls, then flatten slightly. Using floured hands, make a hole in the centre with your finger, then pull and stretch dough, while maintaining round shape, to form 9cm round doughnuts (centre hole should be about 4cm).

Preheat air fryer to 180Â°C for 3 minutes. Place half of the doughnuts in air-fryer basket. Cook for 8 minutes, turning halfway through, or until golden brown and cooked through. Transfer to a wire rack to cool. Repeat with remaining doughnuts.

Meanwhile, combine milk and remaining sugar in a medium bowl. Tint pink with food colouring. Dip surface of each doughnut in icing and return to wire rack, icing-side up. Scatter with sprinkles. Serve.
